alert.note: Alert for Lac Qui Parle; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:10AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lac qui Parle and central Yellow Medicine Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 309 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Dawson, or 19 miles southwest of Montevideo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dawson around 320 AM CDT. Boyd around 325 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 20 and 28. U.S. Highway 75 between mile markers 95 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
